content: We're getting ready for FHIR DevDays 2016, 16-18 November in Amsterdam. We created topics in the connectathon mgmt stream, starting with DevDays16, followed by the name of the track. This is where track leads and participants will communicate before and during the event. Visit the website for more information and registration.
Question about the DevDays tracks, are the publicly available test servers usually used by the tracks? And if so, what FHIR versions are being targeted, 1.6? Or an interim 1.7?
I'm not sure which version; my public STU3 server is tracking the changes and I have no choice about that
Our Spark server will still be targeting DSTU2.
